com.teamten.chess
Class Side

java.lang.Object
  com.teamten.chess.Side

public class Side
extends Object

Sides are represented as an integer, with 0 for white and 1 for black. This class provides utility methods and constants.

Field Summary
static int BLACK
           
static int WHITE
           
 
Method Summary
static char convertCharacter(int side, char ch)
          Converts the piece character (such as "b" for bishop) to upper or lower case as appropriate for the side.
static int getOtherSide(int side)
          Given a side, returns the other side.
static int getUnicodeOffset(int side)
          Return the offset from 0x2654 for this color.
static String toString(int side)
          Returns a string version of the side ("White" or "Black").

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

convertCharacter

public static char convertCharacter(int side,
                                    char ch)
Converts the piece character (such as "b" for bishop) to upper or lower case as appropriate for the side.

getUnicodeOffset

public static int getUnicodeOffset(int side)
Return the offset from 0x2654 for this color. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chess_symbols_in_Unicode

getOtherSide

public static int getOtherSide(int side)
Given a side, returns the other side.
